title: Executive King Suite
description: Luxurious suite with a king-size bed, separate living area, and panoramic city views. Perfect for business and upscale leisure travel.

title: Deluxe Double Room
description: Spacious room featuring two comfortable double beds, high-speed internet, and convenient access to all hotel amenities.

title: Standard Queen
description: A comfortable and elegantly furnished room with a single queen bed, offering great value without compromising on quality.

title: Presidential Suite
description: The pinnacle of luxury. Features multiple rooms, a private dining area, and personalized butler service.

title: Accessible Deluxe
description: Designed for accessibility, this Deluxe room offers enhanced features for comfortable, worry-free stays.
